name: food-ordering-microservices
description: Food ordering system with microservices architecture using Kafka

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=order-service" "npm run dev --workspace=payment-service" "npm run dev --workspace=delivery-service" "npm run dev --workspace=restaurant-service" "npm run dev --workspace=notification-service"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --workspace=user-service && npm install --workspace=order-service && npm install --workspace=payment-service && npm install --workspace=delivery-service && npm install --workspace=restaurant-service && npm install --workspace=notification-service
scripts.db:generate: drizzle-kit generate --config=order-service/drizzle.config.js && drizzle-kit generate --config=payment-service/drizzle.config.js && drizzle-kit generate --config=delivery-service/drizzle.config.js && drizzle-kit generate --config=restaurant-service/drizzle.config.js
scripts.db:push: drizzle-kit push --config=order-service/drizzle.config.js && drizzle-kit push --config=payment-service/drizzle.config.js && drizzle-kit push --config=delivery-service/drizzle.config.js && drizzle-kit push --config=restaurant-service/drizzle.config.js
scripts.db:migrate: drizzle-kit migrate --config=order-service/drizzle.config.js && drizzle-kit migrate --config=payment-service/drizzle.config.js && drizzle-kit migrate --config=delivery-service/drizzle.config.js && drizzle-kit migrate --config=restaurant-service/drizzle.config.js
